snippet.title: Spider Fox Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Spider Fox Coming Soon to Steam! 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2478640/Spider_Fox/
http://planet47games.com/

Spider Fox is a game about a Mad Scientist who has combined all the animals throughout the land. You play as a Spider Fox who must now save the animals and stop the Mad Scientist.

DESCRIPTION
Spider Fox is a single player game about a Mad Scientist who has combined all animals throughout the land. The last animal combined was a spider and a fox. The fox had so much love that the webs of the spider could cure the animals. Spider Fox must now save all animals throughout the land and stop the Mad Scientist.

FEATURES
-Beautiful environments to explore.
-A fun and unique main character to play with.
-Tons of ridiculous combined animals to see and cure.
-You help the animals and not hurt them.
-Each map features new animals and obstacles.
Upgrade your levels for things like climbing and run speed.
-Find treasure chests, hidden coins, and other collectibles.
-New webs to climb in each map.
-Defeat the Mad Scientist.
-Completionists can try to cure every animal in the game.
-A relaxing and charming game for players of all ages.
